entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
